cascading.stats.hadoop

Class HadoopStepStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • cascading.stats.CascadingStats
      • cascading.stats.FlowStepStats
        • cascading.stats.hadoop.BaseHadoopStepStats
          • cascading.stats.hadoop.HadoopStepStats
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public abstract class HadoopStepStats
extends BaseHadoopStepStats
    HadoopStepStats is a hadoop2 (YARN) specific sub-class for fetching TaskReports in an efficient way.
    See Also:
